description:
It`s Shamo.
My friend Yukina is a manga artist and she`s a descendant of the Yin-Yang sorcerors. She uses familiars as assitants.
But right when "this month`s issue needs extra pages", they go on strike. That`s why Mayu and I, and all the others are going to help Yukina, but...
Source: crunchyroll
